Inventory Officer Job at J-Six Group




        
    

        
        J-Six Group is a conglomerate of five subsidiaries in Agro, Cafe, Trade and Logistics, Just Eggs and Quick Service Restaurant; poised towards customers satisfaction, quality products, and friendly discount on purchases.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Inventory Officer
Job Location: Ijora, Lagos
Work Mode: 8hrs Shift
Employment Type: Full-time

Duties
     

            
    




	Follow all standards for issuing and receiving stock within the store’s area of operation.
	Monitor and take inventory on a regular basis to compile orders based on par levels or needs.
	Receive all items and maintain clear and organized records to ensure all reports and invoices are filed and stored properly.
	Monitor periodic automatic reorder levels for all food items to ensure the availability of stock.
	Responsible to verify all goods arrived as per agreed purchase, delivery note, and agreed quantity have been received
	Responsible for the day-to-day check on the storage facilities' upkeep and hygiene.
	Refuse acceptance of damaged, unacceptable, or incorrect items.
	Ensure cleanliness of all areas, keeping storage areas clean and tidy and in strict compliance with hygiene regulations
	Ensure the store requisition form is signed by the person collecting the goods and entered into the inventory/materials management system.
	All invoices must be posted immediately upon receiving items.
	Follow up on documentation of after-hours issues, ensuring it is in accordance with established internal controls and procedures
	Conduct an inventory audit to determine inventory levels and needs.
	Complete requisition forms for inventory and supplies.
	Work closely with Procurement to order and receive items and equipment.


Requirements


	Minimum of an OND qualification
	1 year of work experience in the same or related role is an added advantage for a fast food restaurant.
	Inventory and market requisition knowledge
	Excellent numerical skills and the ability to communicate well with others
	Basic Microsoft Excel knowledge is a must.
	The candidate must live inproximity to the location.


Benefits


	Salary: N80,000 Monthly (Net).
	Staff Lunch
	HMO.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to: recruitment@jsixgroup.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Inventory Officer / Storekeeper Job at HR Leverage Africa




        
    

        
        HR Leverage Africa - Our client in the Fashion Industry is recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Inventory Officer / Storekeeper

Job Location: Gwarimpa, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role


	They are looking for a reliable and meticulous Inventory Officer/Store Keeper to oversee stock management within the store.
	The role focuses on proper record keeping, stock arrangement, and ensuring products are readily available for sales and operations.


Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Receive, inspect, and record all stock items accurately.
	Organize and maintain the store/warehouse in a neat and accessible manner.
	Conduct regular stock counts and report discrepancies.
	Issue products to sales and operations teams based on requisitions.
	Ensure proper tagging, labeling, and storage of all products.
	Maintain up-to-date stock registers and ensure stock card accuracy.
	Monitor stock levels and alert management when items are running low.
	Implement a first-in-first-out (FIFO) system for product rotation.
	Generate inventory reports for management as required.


Requirements


	OND / HND / B.Sc. in Business Administration, Accounting, or related field.
	1 – 3 years of experience in storekeeping, inventory control, or warehouse operations.
	Strong record-keeping and organizational skills.
	Basic knowledge of Excel and inventory software.
	Attention to detail and accuracy in stock handling.
	Ability to work independently with minimal supervision.
	Integrity and accountability in managing stock.


Salary
N120,000 (Gross) Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr.hrleverageafrica@gmail.com using “Inventory Officer / Store Keeper – Abuja” as the subject of the email.

Note: Only those close to Gwarinpa, Abuja, will be considered.
